p.s: Boris Johnson tries to tell the audience his view on climate change in his speech at the opening ceremony of the COP26 World Leaders' Summit on 1st of November 2021 in Glasgow.
The britishBritish Prime Minister tries to convince his listeners that long time has gone by notingnothing really happened against climatechange.
Boris Johnson says that wecould start today with changing something.
He says that we already have the means and we just have to act now.
In the beginning of his speech he makes clear that the existence of climate change and the urgent climate crisis is known by everyone.
The main appeal of Boris Johnson is to think about the future generations and the responsibility all of them have.
He says that they will judge us for not acting now.
